'''Festive Fever''' represents the festive mood during the [[Lantern Rite]]. It is required for unlocking [[event]] content related to the Lantern Rite.

==How to Obtain==
Players must complete [[All That Glitters]] quests from the [[Lantern Rite]] event and requests from the [[Lantern Rite Tales]] event to obtain Festive Fever and to progress through its stages.

{| class="wikitable"
!Stage !! Requirements
|-
| We've Only Just Begun || Complete [[The Origin of the Lanterns]]
|-
| Guests Flock From Afar || Collect 900 '''Festive Fever''' from [[Lantern Rite Tales]]<br />Complete [[Currents Deep Beneath the Lanterns]]
|-
| Glow of a Thousand Lanterns || Collect 1800 '''Festive Fever''' from [[Lantern Rite Tales]]<br />Complete [[Light Upon the Sea]]
|}
